project.name: Prism (by Jungle Bus)
project.description: Prism is a tool to extract public transport data from OpenStreetMap, in geoCSV and GTFS format

tags.description: to select the public transport line objects. Used to create GTFS routes
to select the public transport route objects
Extracted as the code of the public transport line. Used as route_short_name in the GTFS
Extracted as the destination of the public transport route. Used as trip_headsign in the GTFS
Extracted as the origin of the public transport route
Extracted as the colour of the public transport line or route. Used as route_color in the GTFS
the colour of the public transport vehicle. Can be used as route_color in the GTFS
Extracted as the name of the public transport operator. Used to create GTFS agencies
Extracted as the name of the public transport network. Can be used to create GTFS agencies
Extracted as the public transport mode of the route
Extracted as the public transport mode of the line. Used to compute the route_type in the GTFS
Extracted as the price of the public transport line. Can be used to create GTFS fares
Extracted as the main frequency of the public transport line. Used to define the trips, frequencies and stop_times in the GTFS
Extracted as the travel time of the public transport route. Can be used to compute the stop_times in the GTFS
Extracted as the exceptions to the main frequency. Used to define the frequencies and stop_times in the GTFS
Extracted as the operating hours of the public transport line. Used to define the trips, services and stop_times in the GTFS
